name: Settlements of the Damned
description:
Looking for somewhere special to meet your fate? 

Look no further!

SETTLEMENTS OF THE DAMNED is an online settlement generator for MÖRK BORG uses tables from 1d10+5's Kickstarter exclusive city-crawling supplement, ALÖNE IN THE CROWD. Soon to be in the dirty hands of at least 666 backers. Even if you don't have ALÖNE IN THE CROWD, though, you can still enjoy the myriad cursed dwelling-places that Settlements of the Damned serves up!

The adventures sparks will fly, I'm sure!

Settlements of the Damned  is an independent production by 1d10+5 and is
not affiliated with Ockult Örtmästare Games or Stockholm Kartell. It is
published under the MÖRK BORG Third Party License.
MÖRK BORG is copyright Ockult Örtmästare Games and Stockholm Kartell.
